Package edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.algorithm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Policy
    This interface is implemented by any class which represents a policy for a reinforcement agent.
    ReinforcementLearningAgent
    This interface is implemented by those classes which represent reinforcement learning agent.
    RewardFunction
    Implementers of this interface provide a means by which rewards can be assigned for certain states.
    SimulationBasedReinforcementLearningAgent
    This interface is implemented by those agents which require a simulator in order to iterate their learning functions.
    TransitionFunction
    Implementers of this interface provide a function for state transition in the reinforcement learning world.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MetricTrackingAgent
    This wrapper object tracks the call metrics to another agent which are made through it.
    QLearningAgent
    A reinforcement agent which uses the Q-learning technique.
    StepCostRewardFunction
    Represents a reward function for step cost.
    TerrainBasedTransitionFunction
    This transition function moves the agent in accordance with the rules of the worlds set forth in the assignment specification.
    ValueIteratingAgent
